description:
After two years since the end of the war, http://anidb.net/ch1165 [Katsura] took the Prime Minister position under the name of Donald Zurump, an obvious parody of http://anidb.net/ch93384 [someone] all of us know, and still caused some ruckus and still had enemies, specially the http://anidb.net/ch6221 [Shinsengumi] ex-officers, like http://anidb.net/ch99138 [Okita Sougo].
Source: Gintama Wiki
name: Donald Zurump
